OOC: I like one on one fights, they are easier to post for than big wars ar=
e, so Horn Drill was just hiding and waiting for Najah to turn so he can at=
tack, okay?...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Airshadow Nightlight=
 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 27, 2000 1:52 AM
  Subj=
ect: TO thecode.


  (Well I think that I messed all, What do you think if =
we come back with the fight Horn-dril vs Najah and we forget the lats mails=
?)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2000 9:43 PM
    Subject: Re: War
=


    OOC: Hey, Shokaract just fired, Zardus is the one who made the arm bl=
ow off.
    And I'm sorry, I got you mixed up with JP. I almost got kicked =
out for
    making such a big gestalt, he was 30 feet tall and JP actually =
kicked me
    out. Well, he didn't remove me from egroups, and I just corre=
cted the
    mistake and backed up everything I did. And I can't RP a gesta=
lt correctly?
    I have been doing it for some time, now...


    > Dark O=
ne barrell rolled, escaping autogun fire, letting two missiles loose
    > =
downward at the Mafia Base.

    (Ay ay ay) Base damage: Not much, as usual=
, except the shields were weakened
    by the more powerful than grenade, t=
hingies...

    > Breakdown cursed, not seeing any body parts fly.  He obvi=
ously hadn't hit
    a
    > target.  He fired off a grenade at Shokaract.
=

    Shokaract hadn't expected a grenade. It blasted on him. He got up with=
 a
    groan, looking for the damaged area. He knew where it was when he se=
en an
    arm missing. He grabbed the Gattling Gun with his left hand and f=
ired a
    missile at Breakdown, fireing the other 2 missiles at WarMachine=
.

    > The three missiles explode, driving Pyro back several feet, leavin=
g the
    front
    > end of his tank mode dented and charred.  "FLAMES CAN=
'T HURT ME!" he
    > screamed, firing off three fire balls at Shokaract.

=
    (Why is it when you attack you make a bunch of guys attack the same bot=
? You
    think you can psyche people out?) Shokaract leapt out of the way,=
 landing
    irregularly but it didn't matter, he was missing his right arm=
 anyway.

    > Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Shokaract.

    Shoka=
ract is hit in the head by the blast, his horns on one side falling off
   =
 and clattering to the ground. Shokaract gets angry, he jumps up and gets
 =
   ready for another attack. His smaller gun mounted on his back. (The figu=
re
    can do that, Rampage can, so I guess Shokaract can, too.)

    > Ser=
pentor hissed, charging Shokaract, his energy blade in one hand, his
    > =
plasma rifle in the other.  "Time to die!" he yelled as he fired off three
=
    > bolts from his rifle at Shokaract's abdomen.

    (Yep, at Shokaract,=
 Serge is there, you know.) Shokaract cartwheeled out of
    the way with t=
he crab legs on his shoulders. He fired from the little gun, 2
    shots at=
 Serpentor. Serge fires 2 missiles at Serpentor.



          eGroups Spons=
or
